column4: alright.. does anyone know if there's some sort of issue with mouse recognition in ubuntu 8.x, i've looked at my xorg.conf, and the correct mouse information is commented out. the mouse itself works properly, as it worked fine on the livedvd that i installed from. thanks for any help.
8.10 is not supported anymore, its EOL

any general idea on how to fix a mouse that's not being recognized on any linux version.. mouse recognition isn't at all distro or version specific.. its moderately irrelevant whether or not its still supported.. or at least it shouldn't be
